name: Kalabour
description:
A Platformer game  where your Objective is to Beat the level AS FAST AS POSSIBLE.

First off thanks for reading the description glad we caught your interest.

As seen in game listing description this game is currently in beta

Any and all levels, features, textures, and more may be modified or removed completely from the game at any time.

Positive and Negative Criticism are much appreciated to help with finding glitches bugs or errors which may or may not harm the users play experience.

Praise and suggestions are also gladly accepted but never demanded of.

Also quick note if you get stuck to a wall move left or right to kick off of it I’m working on fixing the jank in the wall jump right now

Finally thanks once again for Reading the description and checking out the game page.
